Asset Valuation Methods

Determine residual value using industry-specific valuation streams.

üìä

Fair Market Valuation

Servers, workstations, non-specialised IT components ‚Äî HP DL/ML series, Dell PowerEdge/Precision, Lenovo Think systems.

Asset classes

‚Üí How we value it

Book-value model with proprietary ARC3 Index adjustment. Quarterly resampling against BDO, Gartner, AMR returns.

üéØ

Residual Value Recovery (RAAS Grade)

Gaming GPUs, HPC accelerators, Linux appliances with recertifiable chassis (nVidia DGX lineage).

Asset classes

‚Üí How we value it

80% of main ARC3 Index components tracked: VRAM, TMU, ROP density assessed. Quarterly refinancing grade against STAC-M3.

‚öôÔ∏è

Specialised Equipment Valuation

nVidia DGX GraceHopper, AMD MI300X, liquid-cooled scale-up rigs, advanced switches (Arista 7280/7500R).

Asset classes

‚Üí How we value it

Part-to-spec benchmarking via Secunet / NREL / Graviton valuation; recertification to OEM baseline.

üîÑ

Legacy & End-of-Life Equipment

HP Moonshot, Cisco UCS 1st/2nd Gen, Splunk native appliances, obsolete networking kit.

Asset classes

‚Üí How we value it

Down-cycling yield valuation: PCIe lanes, DRAM yield, substrate recovery (OEM buyback mechanism).

Recovery Options

Choose how you want to realise value. Cash recovery, hardware trade-up, circular economy monetisation, or ICO-ready audit documentation.

üí∞

Cash Payment

Bank transfer (BACS/FPS) within 5 business days of acceptance. Documentation package includes Chain-of-Custody Report, NIST 800-88 Sanitisation Certificate, and UK Revenue-ready Income Statement.

üîÑ

Hardware Refresh Trade-Up

Convert full residual value into next-generation on-prem hardware (HPE ProLiant, Dell PowerEdge, nVidia DGX installed base). Zero-touch deployment via G-Cloud accredited integrators.

‚ôªÔ∏è

Circular Value Capture (ESG Credit)

Capture value in form of verified carbon avoidance (ISO 14067) and Scope 3 impact units (GHG Protocol). Monetised against SFDR ESRS E3-5 or LSE FTSE4Good indices. Aids pre-IPO disclosure.

‚úÖ

Asset Recovery Assurance (POE)

Proof of Erasure (POE) service for storage media. Cryptographic-level Chain-of-Custody report stamped with ICO C18880232 compliance reviewed by PwC annual.

‚ö†Ô∏è Shareholder Dilution Advisory

Hardware recovery can be disclosed under IFRS 5 as separate disposal group. HMRC may treat as chargeable gain event (CT600 Box 7 ‚Äî income from estimate).

Select Recovery Option

Trust & Security

Custody and forensic-level reporting demanded by HM Government and financial regulators.

üîí NCSC Large-scale Approved ITAD

Approved for 5,000+ seat projects under NCSC Large-scale IT Asset Destruction Programme. All subcontractors vetted via the UK's Security Cleared Personnel process (BPSS + CTC).

üåç Basel Convention Export Compliance

Certified downstream trackers for Basel-controlled commodities. Aligns with BECCS (Basel Export Compliance Control Scheme) for intra-EU IT asset movements (Hermes / TNT 6-digit SKU level).

End-to-End Workflow ‚Äî Transparent & Documented

Closed-loop custody ‚Äî your hardware becomes our custody until asset class end-of-life state is achieved.

1. Initial Audit

Assets Capture & Initial Audit

Client uploads manifest online or provides via CSV/XLS ‚Äî serial number, model, mac address, baseline configuration, service agreement status, and decommissioning date.

CRM ‚Üí SantizeIT ‚Üí Triage Gate-1

2. Valuation

Residual Value Assessment

Lock Forecast Valuation within 24 hours using ARC3 model ‚Äî recalibrated against Gartner Q3 2025 Fair Market Value Index. Segmented into Fair, Revenue, and Specialised streams.

ARC3 + BDO Quarterly Index + STAC-M3 Benchmark

3. Collection

Secure Collection & Logistics

TNT Logistics / DPD couriered with Government-approved DSVA cages. Full geofenced GPS tracking and RFID securing of every cage. CO‚ÇÇ-neutral offset aligned with UK Green Freight Charter.

24‚Üí48h transit time

4. Triage

Declassification & Triage

HMG IS5-declassified to IL0 (at NCSC-approved Debuttering facility). Visual inspection, triage into stream (data erasure, circular recovery, asset valuation track).

NCSC Debuttering Centre, ELCID detection tools

5. Processing & Outcome

Processing & Final Outcome

Stream-specific outcomes: erasure, refurbishment, dismantling. Result: secure outcome documented with Chain-of-Custody Report, NIST 800-88 sanitisation certificate, and UK Revenue-ready income statement.
